title: Jungle Friends
subtle: Concept (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: What is your favorite jungle animal? Jungle Friends introduces students to several different animals that live in a jungle, including tigers, ants, frogs, and more! The detailed and colorful illustrations, as well as the repetitive text structure, will support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify the setting to better understand a story.
meta: friends, frog, jungle, monkey, snake, tiger
Connect to prior knowledge to better understand text
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /j/ sound
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
Color Words : Identify and use color words
